sentences.en: ‘Come quickly,’ she said in a husky whisper.
sentences.cn: “快来。”她用沙哑的嗓音低声说道。

sentences.en: Cracked and husky voices pronounced forcibly upon odd matters.
sentences.cn: 粗哑的声音在使劲地讲述着稀奇古怪的事情.

sentences.en: He coughed continually and his voice became a little bit husky.
sentences.cn: 他不停的咳嗽,说话声音有些干涩了.
他是个高大强壮的男孩.

sentences.en: He spoke with a soft husky voice in a melodic accent.
sentences.cn: 他微微沙哑的声音带着一种悠扬的口音.

sentences.en: He tried to speak to her and found his throat so husky that no words came.
sentences.cn: 他想要跟她说话,发现他喉咙沙哑得很,讲不出话来.

sentences.en: Her voice was husky with anger.
sentences.cn: 她的声音因愤怒而沙哑.

sentences.en: His speaking voice, a gruff husky tenor, added to the impression of fractiousness he conveyed.
sentences.cn: 他说话的声音, 又粗又大的男高音, 增添了他给人的性情暴戾的印象.

sentences.en: His voice was husky with grief.
Husky seems to be a little silly, but quite cute.
sentences.cn: 哈士奇看起来有点傻乎乎, 但却挺可爱.

sentences.en: I'm still a bit husky after my recent cold.
sentences.cn: 我最近患过感冒,声音还有些哑.

sentences.en: She spoke in a husky whisper.
sentences.cn: 她低沉沙哑地轻声说话。

sentences.en: Simultaneously I heard his voice, gruff, muffled, husky, at the hall telephone.
sentences.cn: 就在同时我听见了他的声音, 粗犷 、 低沉 、 沙哑, 正在用门廓的电话与什么人通着话.

sentences.en: The husky ball players threw all calculations out of joint.
sentences.cn: 那些体格魁梧的橄榄球队员会把原先的计算统统打乱.

sentences.en: There was a husky tenderness in his tone. " Daisy? "
sentences.cn: 他沙哑的声音流露着柔情, “ 黛西? ”

words.tran_cn: 剥玉米壳的工作；农家碾米会
声音沙哑的；有壳的；强壮的
强壮结实之人；爱斯基摩人

trans.tran_cn: 嗓子哑的，强壮的，有壳的
trans.tran_en: a husky voice is deep, quiet, and attractive
a dog with thick hair used in Canada and Alaska to pull  sledges  over the snow
